title: The Ripple Effect
features: What if you could gather together with a couple of people and meet with them in a way that changes not only their lives, but yours too? Let’s admit it: the word leader conjures up strong emotions for you. Maybe you hesitate to lead out of fear you don’t have what it takes. Leadership is easier than you think. The Ripple Effect is your step- by- step guide through the process of creating, maintaining and multiplying a thriving small group. Drawing on honest, personal stories from her twelve years of mentoring and ministering to women, Michelle S. Lazurek empowers you to:•Utilize the triad model in group formation•Create a compelling vision and mission statement •Analyze your triad’s internal and external mission •Avoid common group pitfalls and effectively troubleshoot issues among your membersWith exclusive access to an online community for support and weekly leadership strategies (www.influencingothers.org), The Ripple Effect is your trusted guidebook for effective and authentic small group leadership.
description: Michelle S. Lazurek is a pastor's wife, a mother, an author, and a speaker. Her writing has been published in numerous publications, including www.womensministry.net, and christiandevotions.us. Her e- book Everything I Learned About Writing I Learned From Rocky Balboa: Six Ways To Keep Fighting Without Throwing in the Towel made Amazon's best seller list in its category. She holds a Master's degree in Counseling from Liberty University. Please visit her website at www.michellelazurek.com.
